content:
Is there a Release Notice listing what has changed for users?

Are there updates to the User Manual?

Without these there are going to be lots of questions having to be answered.

Tony, Hakan has made changes to the Options > Connections section. Not sure if he has finished it however.
https://opencpn.org/wiki/dokuwiki/doku.php?id=opencpn:manual_basic:toolbar:options:connections

I added a description of the new prioritization function.
The section "Connections" need some reorganisation. There are also pictures from before O 5.6
